tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Waste_Disposal (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  disposal_method VARCHAR(50),
  recycling_initiative BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    type VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    disposal_method VARCHAR(255),
    pickup_schedule VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE recycling_initiatives (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    type VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    recycling_method VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_statistics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  collection_id INT,
  recycling_center_id INT,
  waste_type VARCHAR(100),
  quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE waste_bins (id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
 location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 capacity INT NOT NULL,
 last_emptied TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE disposal_records (id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
 bin_id INT NOT NULL,
 disposal_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
 disposed_materials VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE recycling_statistics (center_id INT NOT NULL,
 year INT NOT NULL,
 materials_recycled INT NOT NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY(center_id, year));

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_centers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_pickup_schedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  center_id INT,
  pick_up_date DATE,
  pick_up_route TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_bins (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location TEXT,
  capacity INT,
  collected_materials TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_records (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  center_id INT,
  collection_date DATE,
  collected_weight FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_statistics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  material_type TEXT,
  recycled_amount FLOAT
)
